Function reference

All functions

CompareSim()
Perform simulation and compare them to original species
CompareTaxo()
Compare the original taxonomic information of a dataset with predicted one
CreateAlpha()
Create matrix of posterior alpha
DirichCat()
Draw a full species name using a Categorical-Dirichlet scheme
DrawBota()
Gives a botanical name to a tree with a vernacular nameT
DrawDeterm()
Attribute the most likely full species name
Get1Sim()
Simulate a fully determined dataset

plot the accuracy of scenarios

plot the accuracy of scenarios
